title: (x) Bob Evans Restaurant hand written logo script - custom designed {Mikey D}
content: Trying to figure out what font is used for the Bob Evans Restaurant font.
author: Joe Ferraro

comments.content:
It's polite to include an image so we don't have to go get it for you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110402182611im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BobEvansLogo_6437.png)
Thanks for the image. I tried uploading a jpg, but my computer kept getting hung up.

Its a custom logotype.

Sorry... Mikey
I figured it was a custom deal. I was looking at Brody before, but the letters for my client make the Freestyle a good match. Thanks for the suggestion.
